A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No respectable critic can watch this movie with its bad characterization\, uneven pace\, uninspired plot\, tone-deaf jokes\, and supposed \"twists\" (that are only twists because nobody expected such bad writing) and even think this movie is passable. Copied from another reviewer\, because this puts it better than I ever could: \"People that love the mindless spectacle will like it. People that ask for coherent storytelling will not.\"
